Title: Python Software Developer- Bangalore (Pan India Infosys)

If you think you fit right in to help our clients navigate their next in their digital transformation journey, this is the place for you!

Title: Python Software Developer
Description: About the Role We are looking for a detail-oriented Quality Analyst (QA) to ensure the delivery of high-quality software products. You will be responsible for creating test plans, executing manual/automated tests, identifying bugs, and collaborating with development teams to ensure smooth and bug-free releases. Key Responsibilities Develop and execute test plans, test cases, and test scripts . Perform manual testing (functional, regression, integration, UAT) across web/mobile applications. Identify, document, and track defects using tools like Jira, Bugzilla, or Azure DevOps . Collaborate with developers and product teams to diagnose and resolve issues. Validate new features and enhancements before release. Perform smoke testing, sanity testing, and regression testing . Ensure application quality through cross-browser, cross-platform, and device testing. Prepare and maintain detailed test reports and documentation. Assist in developing automation test scripts (if applicable). Required Skills & Qualifications Strong understanding of software testing methodologies (SDLC, STLC). Experience with manual testing of web and/or mobile applications. Knowledge of test case design techniques and defect lifecycle. Familiarity with testing tools like Jira, TestRail, Postman, Selenium (optional) . Basic understanding of APIs and ability to perform API testing. Good analytical and problem-solving skills. Attention to detail and ability to think from an end-user perspective. Strong communication and collaboration skills. Preferred / Nice-to-Have Skills Experience with automation testing (Selenium, Appium, Cypress, Playwright). Knowledge of performance testing tools (JMeter, LoadRunner). Understanding of SQL for basic database validation. Experience in Agile/Scrum environments. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and version control (Git). Education Bachelors degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering, or related field (or equivalent experience)

Title: Python Developer
Description: Job Summary: We are looking for a talented Python Developer with strong experience in Core Python and frameworks like Django and Flask . The ideal candidate will be responsible for building scalable web applications, developing APIs, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness. Key Responsibilities: Design, develop, and maintain web applications using Python , Django , and Flask . Build and integrate RESTful APIs for backend services. Write clean, efficient, and reusable code following best practices. Collaborate with front-end developers and other team members to deliver complete solutions. Optimize applications for performance, scalability, and security . Perform unit testing, debugging , and participate in code reviews. Stay updated with emerging Python technologies and frameworks. Required Skills & Qualifications: Strong proficiency in Core Python . Hands-on experience with Django and Flask frameworks . Knowledge of ORMs (Django ORM, SQLAlchemy). Familiarity with RESTful API development . Experience with databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB). Understanding of Git and version control systems. Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for integration. Preferred Qualifications: Exposure to cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). Experience with Docker and containerized deployments. Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines . Soft Skills: Strong problem-solving and analytical skills. Excellent communication and collaboration abilities. Ability to work in an Agile environment.

Title: Urgent hiring For Python Developer
Description: Role & responsibilities Mandatory Skills: 1. Very strong in Python programming, developing REST API (using FastAPI, Django, Flask or other libraries) and integration with other web services. 2. Integration experience with data sources like REST web services, Kafka, Oracle, third party systems like Workday, etc. 3. Ability to implement best practices handling modularity, security and scalability in the Python applications 4. Experience in SQL 5. Experience in Azure cloud services for developing/deploying/securing Python app (REST API). 6. Ability to implement workflow rules using rules engine like Temporal or Azure logic app or python libraries. 7. Good to have exposure in deployment of python app on Kubernetes. 8. Excellent written & spoken communication skills, ability to interact with customer & relevant stakeholders. 9. Ability to understand the provided requirements, ability to assist in architecting solutions and ability to translate it into the implementation, following best practices. 10. Proactive, Self-driven, motivated, result oriented, ability to take ownership and excellent learning attitude. 11. Experience in working with complex enterprise client ecosystem. Roles & Responsibilities About the Team: - You will be part of a dynamic and agile team that values innovation and creativity in software development. - The team comprises experienced developers, testers, and project managers committed to delivering excellence in every project. - A collaborative atmosphere encourages knowledge sharing and continuous learning among team members. You are Responsible for: -  development, and deployment of applications using Python and Fast API. - ensuring code reviews, and best practices are followed - Ensuring timely delivery of projects while maintaining high standards of code quality and performance. To succeed in this role  you should have the following: - Strong experience in Python development, particularly with Fast API and web frameworks. - Proven leadership skills and experience in mentoring junior developers. - Excellent problem-solving abilities and a strong understanding of software development methodologies. --
